description.value: You can use a Focus Point to change your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-spells.Item.Nur1CbemWaor1hcv]{Eldritch Blast} into a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-spells.Item.uK0kQqCt6EcT2izn]{Healing Blast}. A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-spells.Item.uK0kQqCt6EcT2izn]{Healing Blast}Â heals living creatures instead of dealing damage to them. If the target is undead, it takes twice the amount of vitality damage instead.
